Body: I have a Lava Iris X1 (8GB ROM), but the storage shows up in two types.Internal storage total space is 3.54GB:Available                         : 2.52GBApps (app data & media etc.)      : 0.97GBCached data                       : 48.17MBPhone storage total space is 2.50GB:Available                         : 8.55MBApps (app data & media etc.)      : 27.54MBPictures, videos                  : 1.85GBaudio (music, ringtones etc.)     : 313MBDownloads                         : 25.92MBCached data                       : 64.14MBMisc.                             : 223MBI am confused about why my phone memory is less than 8 GB. Is my phone's total ROM capacity 8GB or not?
Title: Why does my phone show less storage than it's supposed to?

history.Text: i have lava iris x1(8GB ROM)phone.but the storage is show up differently in 2 types.internal storage total space is: 3.54GB  available                      : 2.52GB,  apps(app data&media etc.)      : 0.97GB,  cached data                    : 48.17MB.phone storage total space is   : 2.50GB  availabul                      : 8.55MB,  apps(app data&madia etc.)      : 27.54MB,  pictures,videos                : 1.85GB,  audio(music,ringtones etc.)    : 313MB ,  downloads                      : 25.92MB,   cached data                    : 64.14MB,  misc.                          : 223MB.so,i am confused about my phone memory.pls tell me anybody about MY phone total ROM capacity (8GB or NOT).

I have a Lava Iris X1 (8GB ROM), but the storage shows up in two types.Internal storage total space is 3.54GB:    Available                         : 2.52GB    Apps (app data & media etc.)      : 0.97GB    Cached data                       : 48.17MBPhone storage total space is 2.50GB:    Available                         : 8.55MB    Apps (app data & media etc.)      : 27.54MB    Pictures, videos                  : 1.85GB    audio (music, ringtones etc.)     : 313MB    Downloads                         : 25.92MB    Cached data                       : 64.14MB    Misc.                             : 223MBI am confused about why my phone memory is less than 8 GB. Is my phone's total ROM capacity 8GB or not?
Why does my phone show less storage than it's supposed to?
